description_part1: I am a web designer and developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites.
description_part2: I have experience in both front-end and back-end development, and
description_highlight: I am always looking for new challenges to push my skills to the next level
description_part3: Whether you need help with your website or just want to learn more about web development, I'm here to assist you.

0descriptionP: A restaurant management system designed to streamline operations and enhance the dining experience. Customers can browse menus, place pre-orders, and request assistance, while waitstaff manage tables and receive real-time notifications. The kitchen benefits from live order tracking and instant communication with the staff.
1descriptionP: This point-of-sale (POS) system developed with Windows Forms is designed to efficiently manage sales, inventory, and customer operations in a retail business environment. Integration with SAP Business One enables synchronization of key data such as inventory, transactions, and administrative reports, ensuring a centralized and automated information flow.
2descriptionP: TimeGrid is an online calendar for efficient event and task management. It provides a modern interface with multiple views and customization options, including event color selection. Users can easily create, edit, and organize schedules while enabling collaboration through shared event management.
3descriptionP: SmileNotes is a digital journaling app focused on promoting mental well-being through daily emotional check-ins and guided reflections. It provides users with a private and supportive space to write, track moods, and build self-awareness. With friendly prompts, mindfulness reminders, and inspiring messages, SmileNotes encourages healthy journaling habits that support emotional resilience and personal growth.
text1: I'm a web developer with experience designing interactive user interfaces and building Full Stack solutions. I enjoy learning new technologies and continuously improving my skills to create efficient and scalable applications.
list1: Programming Languages: Java, Python, C#, JavaScript, TypeScript
list2: Frameworks & Libraries: React, Astro, .NET, MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), Tailwind CSS, Oak (Deno)
list3: Databases: SQL, MySQL; query design and optimization
list4: Tools & Methodologies: Node.js, Yarn, Docker, Git, Jest, Figma; best practices in business environments, systems analysis, and design
list5: Frontend Development: Design and development of interactive and responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, ensuring a smooth and engaging user experience.
list6: UX/UI Optimization: Creating effective conversion-optimized landing pages by applying modern design and user experience principles.
list7: Databases: Management of relational and non-relational databases, with a focus on efficient design and optimized queries.
list8: Technology Integration: Implementation of Full Stack projects using modern frameworks like MERN and tools such as Docker, Socket.io, and Postman.
contactMe: I am available for new projects, collaborations, or any inquiries. Feel free to reach out!
